summary: Three balloons were added near Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
----------------
Whiterun Balloon Site (ver 1.1)
----------------

[b]Three balloons were added near Whiterun.[/b]

[b][color=red]Please be sure to back up your save file.[/color][/b]

[color=yellow]Whiterun Balloon Site V2
V2 is straddling both Tamriel and Whiterun World. 
Since significant changes have been made , this was treated as a separate MOD.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15472[/color]

---
Author : hdela


---
This mod was built with Skyrim US Ver 1.5.24.0


---
Installation : Unzip the file, and overwrite Skyrim Data folder. Or drop the esp into your Skyrim Data directory.


---
Ver 1.1 : Second MOD

*The excessive object was deleted in order to improve FPS.
*The handrail was attached to the spiral staircase. 
*You can fast travel to the deck of the balloon.
*Other small parts were adjusted.


Ver 1.0 : First MOD

Bedroll x3
No respawn container x8
Disply case x8

Alchemy Workbench
Enchanting Workbench

Smelter Marker
BlackSmith Forge
Armor Workbench 
Blacksmith Sharpening Wheel
Tanning Rack Marker
Cooking Pot


---
Enjoy!

by hdela
author: hdela

files.name: Whiterun Balloon Site V1-1
files.changelogHtml:
*The excessive object was deleted in order to improve FPS.
*The handrail was attached to the spiral staircase.
*You can fast travel to the deck of the balloon.
*Other small parts were adjusted.
